overview:
Tamal Anwar is a smart entrepreneur who likes to illustrate new business ideas and give them real shapes. In his young age, he has managed to gain real success in different fields of Internet Marketing.

Tamal has received great feedbacks and appreciation from his customers. He provides services like- Web Design, Music Promotion, Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Marketing, Local Business Marketing and Consultancy to his customers.

He likes to pass his time watching documentary movies, traveling and painting. He’s quite straight-forward in nature and loves to pass honest reviews to his blog readers and e-mail subscribers.

He’s a student of Business Administration and has earned a degree in Business Management. Tamal has a good grip over English and other communication skills. Tamal’s inquisitiveness to learn something new and imply them in his own life is a great quality in his life which makes him unique.

He gives equal importance to the works that pay trifles and the works that pay huge. He’s efficient in working under deadlines which helps him to run his life in a smooth and disciplined way.

Tamal is efficient in Social Media Marketing and he’s available in almost all active social medias. Find him where you’re easy at.
